column4: Hey guys - my swap is at 0.0% is that normal?  Shouldn't it be using something?
OK thanks - isn't swap used for hibnernation as well
Ubuntu only uses swap if you are out of RAM?  and doesn't use it for suspending / hibernation?
it should use it for hibernation (one could use a file but the default is the swap ... though I cannot tell you why if it does not as that s why I came here to ask
